title: Visual Win32 (UI) style?
content:
what is the following image is about ? Is it design using win32 (UI) ? the following image contains functions are being output from a DLL. Can you help me to understand. Suggest me anything which will help me understand what these UI is all about?

EDiT: Where can i find tutorial / guide on sciter. Thanks

comments.text: The fact that every name starts with "HTMLLayout" is a pretty good clue it is not (immediately) related to the Windows UI...

By the way, I disagree about the close votes. This is not asking about reverse engineering a specific system, it's asking for clues where to find more information about these functions. Big difference. This is not at all dissimilar to questions like this one.

answers_data.content:
That looks to be Sciter, previous known as HTMLLayout. That should lead you to the appropriate documentation necessary to study what those functions do.

Source: The Google Machine

comments.text: I didn't know it at all. It is like these guys invented electron years before electron born
Where can i find tutorial / guide on sciter?
